virtual-sensor.name: Thur_pos5_DozerDecagonMux__chart3
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerDecagonMuxMsg) information from Thur deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, TEMPERATURE0, TEMPERATURE1, TEMPERATURE2, TEMPERATURE3, TEMPERATURE4 from Thur_Dozer_DecagonMux__conv__1950

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, TEMPERATURE0, TEMPERATURE1, TEMPERATURE2, TEMPERATURE3, TEMPERATURE4 from wrapper where POSITION = 5 and PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID = 1 and GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
